body:
It should be noted that GNU rm produces different errors for unknown flags:

```
rm: invalid option -- 'X'
Try 'rm --help' for more information.
```

And no automatic invocation of `--help` happens. The primary reference to `unknown shorthand flag: 'f' in -f` I could find was https://github.com/ogier/pflag/blob/master/flag.go#L530 and OpenShift/Kubernetes related things.
